Nope. Chemistry is just chemistry. Nobody should be suprised that self-organizing chemical systems involving catalytic centers are possible. Nobody should be suprised that complexes will form. I will say however that the researchers have asked a neat question and approached the answer with considerable creativity. If you think its idiocy then you are of course free to rebut their findings in your next PNAS paper.
When it comes to supporting the christian right, NEVER EVER talk about idiodicy.

Don't worry WW - NOBODY takes you seriously.
 
 Except perhaps anti-psychology supposedly former YECist Berthajane vandegrift.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Idiocy taken seriously.
